name: Dogker - Fun Poker Rush
description:
Dogker is the first ever combination between casual game and poker, playing by the full Poker rules.
This brings you the best experience of playing poker ever, just like nowhere else you can find it.
We make it to be sure that you will like this Dogker game much

Dogker is kinda having a story line so you have to do practical missions in order to complete the scenes, bosses in the Beat the Boss mode will show no mercy, really!

How to play:
* Make handlist with 5 cards.
* Have a full deck with 52 cards.
* Create best top handlists.
* List of Handlists is available just for your information.

Dogker features:
* BEAT THE BOSS:
Get higher score to defeat the Boss!
Defeat 'em all and rescue your puppies...

* MOMERY MODE:
You have to memorise the cards
One fail choose and you go home!


* TOURNAMENT:

All that you have is 2 cards!
Struggle will be harder, be the best of the best

Just download and give it a try, you will like it for sure!
